Package photos.view

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
photos.view.BaseController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddTagController, AdminController, AlbumController, CopyPhotoController, CreateAlbumController, CreateUserController, EditCaptionController, LoginController, MovePhotoController, RenameAlbumController, SearchController, SlideShowController, UserController
public abstract class BaseController extends Object
Base class which includes all switching functions
Author:
Apurva Narde, Max Geiger
